articles.description: A surge of online orders apparently has more human workers cruising the aisles.
articles.content:

articles.author: David Morgan
articles.title: Democrats favored to take control of U.S. Senate, but results could be delayed - Reuters
articles.description: A Democratic drive to win control of the U.S. Senate appeared to fall short, with Democrats picking up only one Republican-held seat while six other races remained undecided early on Wednesday.

articles.title: Owner of East Towne, West Towne malls files for bankruptcy protection amid COVID-19 pandemic - Madison.com
articles.description: The malls, owned and operated by Chattanooga, Tennessee-based CBL, will remain open as the bankruptcy protection process continues.
articles.content: Mall parking lots sat empty at the start of the pandemic as nonessential businesses  including indoor malls  were forced to close. Many of those businesses are still facing revenue losses as infectio… [+1440 chars]
